title: getting a cooldown when the game crashes
body: this is stupid asf, the game randomly crashed while im in queue and i get a cooldown like what a frickn joke potato game... this shouldnt be the case what a waste of time..

replies.body: It sounds like you're getting queue dodge penalties which can escalate if consistent.  This can also happen if matches are continuously declined.  I want to help get this fixed up, but could use more info on what's happening exactly.  When this crash happens, when is it exactly?  Are there any error messages?
